intro: Psychotria rondonii, commonly known as the Rondonia Psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to the Amazon rainforest, specifically found in Brazil, Colombia, and Peru. The plant is characterized by its dense, evergreen foliage and small, fragrant white flowers that bloom throughout the year. It thrives in humid, shaded environments and is often found in the undergrowth of tropical forests. Due to its habitat specificity, it is considered a rare and endangered species.
